==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|A Desultory Stroll|ADesultoryStrollTheme|section=1}}
* The Chinese name of this track is a reference to a line from a poem by Tang dynasty scholar Chu Liang {{zh|{{w|zh:褚亮|褚亮}}}}. The original line of the poem reads {{zh|浮光随日度，漾影逐波深|rm=fúguāng suí rì dù, yàngyǐng zhú bō shēn|tl=the sunlight reflected on the water's surface dissipates with the day, the flickering shadows deepen as they chase the ripples.}}
